item.title: 惟江上之清风，与山间之明月
item.description: 但愿人长久 作词：唐书琛；作曲：卢冠廷 借夜澜静处 独看天涯星 每夜繁星不变 每夜长照耀 但愿人没变 愿似星长久 每夜如星闪照 每夜常在 漫长夜晚星若可不休 问人

item.title: 我眼中的音乐
item.description: 背景 这会是一个很长的博客，记录着在过去或将来音乐对我的影响。这个影响是实实在在的，又有一种超脱于悦耳动听的层面存在，不管它是深刻的探讨问题的

item.title: 往事不堪回首（一）
item.description: 小学时期 竹棍 小学二三年级，学校的植物园在施工，有很多细竹棍堆在地上。上午的最后一节课，是体育。解散后，班里的人玩起了细竹棍，其中就有在竹棍上

These notes cover a wide range of topics, listed in the Table of Contents and ordered in an easily-understood manner. Failures (or

item.title: 姬赓 | 那些梦想还万能的日子
item.description: 一个职业妓女该怎样开始她的自我介绍？17岁那年的雨季，人面兽心的远房亲戚，还是惟利是图的老鸨？凡此种种无疑会被视为俗套，进而该职妓将被定义为

item.title: Notes of Emacs Lisp
item.description: With the support of these powerful tools, I believe I am able to overcome the barrier of knowledge and have the freedom to pursue what I really want (doing research while less subjected to the presure of life). Jul 18 - 23, 2024 To learn Emacs Lisp, I started reading the GNU Emacs Lisp Reference Manual, which was suggested by Andy Stewart in his blog. As a newbie, I dreaded this manual pouring too much dry notations to me without any toy application or practice.

item.title: Write Hugo Posts with OrgMode and ox-hugo
item.description: Table of Contents Why I want to write a blog? OrgMode + ox-hugo Other references unrelated to “OrgMode + ox-hugo” Why I want to write a blog? Writing a blog is not the thing that most people would do. I have never thought of it, even though I get lots of valuable information from blogs written by other people. Such information cover various aspects, including courage if you encounter career

item.title: Build a Blog with Hugo
item.description: OS: macOS Ventura 13.2.1 Hugo site directory: ~/Desktop/blog Hugo theme: hugo-ivy Hugo - getting started Install Hugo from Homebrew brew install hugo hugo version Create a site skeleton cd ~/Desktop hugo new site blog Get a theme met your taste cd blog git clone https://github.com/yihui/hugo-ivy themes/hugo-ivy To view the exampleSite (if it exists) of your selected theme hugo server --source themes/hugo-ivy/exampleSite --themesDir ../../ View and configure the site Copy the configuration file config.

item.title: Todo
item.description: [2024-09-03 Tue] Project Emacs Dictionary Motivation: using Emacs to collect new word for TOEFL preparatioin Note: google-translate is great except unusable in Mainland China (I don’t know how to tweak it). Phonetic transcription of Google Translate usually make me confused. bing-dict works in Mainland China, but provided information is too limited (in minibuffer). Phonetic transcription of bing-dict is okay. When I read the code of bing-dict, the following idea comes
